snippet: CBS Sports filled a big void on its golf broadcasting team by hiring Dottie Pepper, giving the network, which covers the most PGA Tour events, its first female voice.
abstract: Golf analyst Dottie Pepper replaces David Feherty to become first female analyst on CBS Sports.
lead_paragraph: CBS Sports filled a big void on its golf broadcasting team by hiring Dottie Pepper, giving the network, which covers the most PGA Tour events, its first female voice.

headline.print_headline: CBS Hires Pepper as Golf Analyst
